title: Crystal Beach Hotel website
task: redesign website and implement on-line reservations system.
text_top: The Crystal Beach Hotel is located at 25th Street and the Boardwalk overlooking clean, wide beach on the Atlantic Ocean. The hotel is within walking distance of shopping, fine dining, fun eateries, and the amusements on Ocean City's newly renovated boardwalk.
text_bottom: The new Crystal Beach Hotel website was developed on the base of our new hospitality solution htl@dmin. htl@dmin gives hotel employees full control of website and on-line inventory. In order to monitor website performance and track visitors’ activity Google Analytics services are used.
